# Government Tender Announcement 

## Solicitation #WS3999432260

### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Non-Medevac Air Charter Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for a non-medevac air charter service for transporting clients of the First Nations and Inuit Health Branch from and to locations in Northern Saskatchewan. This solicitation aims to establish a contract with task authorizations for a period of three years, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods. 

### Requirements and Details

* **Contract Term:** October 1, 2023 to September 30, 2026
* **Contract Extension Option:** Up to two one-year periods (retaining the option to extend)
* **Transportation Requirements:** Non-medevac air charter services for transporting approved Non-Insured Health Benefit clients and physicians between locations in Northern Saskatchewan
* **Request Type:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest combined rating based on technical merit and price
* **Procurement Category:** Service (SER)

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** August 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** July 19, 2023
* **Publication Date:** July 13, 2023

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Kaiser, Erin (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Note:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All bids must be submitted by the specified closing date and time to be considered responsive. 

### Brief Description of Services

Services shall be provided on an "as and when requested" basis. Aboriginal affairs are a priority for Indigenous Services Canada. Compliance with the Phased Bid Compliance Process is mandatory for this procurement. 

You're not limited to the 1200 words count now, you can write more details about the procurement processes, but keep the same professional tone and style.
Please make sure the tender announcement is correctly formatted, but include any additional relevant information below the main announcement.

## Additional Information

A bidder's conference will be conducted to clarify the terms of this solicitation. Details will be available once registration has been confirmed through the Ariba Discovery site. All qualified bidders will be invited to a virtual meeting.

The Federal Contractors Program for employment equity applies to this procurement
